title: Hitler and Stalin: Parallel Lives
description: Physical description; xx, 1189 p., [28] p. of plates : ill. ; 25 cm. Notes; Includes bibliography: p. 1127-1150 and index. English. Summary; A comparative study of the lives and careers of Hitler and Stalin. Alternate chapters on each serve both to draw contrasts and highlight parallels. The author gives his reasons for believing that the key to an understanding the character of the two is the same. Subjects; Hitler, Adolf (1889-1945). Stalin, Joseph (1878-1953).
